medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 1 week ago with episodes of nausea, vomiting, and abdominal pain, particularly on the right side near the epigastric port site. The patient experienced difficulty tolerating oral intake and reported watery diarrhea with no blood.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ulcerative Colitis, Asthma with multiple hospitalizations, Allergic Rhinitis, Hyperlipidemia, and Hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has a history of Coronary Artery Disease and Diabetes Mellitus; no family history of cancer is noted.
